message.body: There is a belated birthday present for you in your front porch behind the mirror. :-)
WOW! Thank you so much! Its probably a good thing I wasn't here cause I definitely would have made you stay to taste it... Though you did miss out on my
little happy dance. Very excited to hear about tomorrow. I know you'll be great.
I'm glad I was able to find it :-) Thanks for the vote of confidence! If I get to see you afterward, I think you should show me the happy dance.
sorry, phone was on vibrate... Are you done?
